mbean.name: jboss.util:type=Service,name=VIDaaSProperties
mbean.attribute: seamLocaion=/opt/seam/ serverLocation=/opt/jboss/ serverURL=http://localhost:8080/ VIDaaSDataLocation=/opt/VIDaaSData jdbcDriverJar=/opt/DatabaseDrivers/postgresql.jar uk.ac.ox.oucs.sudamih.adminUserName = sudamihAdmin uk.ac.ox.oucs.sudamih.adminUserNamePW = sudamihAdminPW uk.ac.ox.oucs.sudamih.databaseName = sudamihtestdb uk.ac.ox.oucs.sudamih.driverName = org.postgresql.Driver uk.ac.ox.oucs.sudamih.databaseURL = jdbc:postgresql:
